name: Tile movement
description: Moves an object around a 2D grid.

conditions.name: Is moving
conditions.description: True when the object is moving.

conditions.name: Is enabled
conditions.description: Test if the behavior is enabled.

conditions.name: Can move to
conditions.description: Test if the object can move into a cell.

conditions.name: Is moving in direction
conditions.description: True when the object is moving in the specified direction.

conditions.name: Can move in direction
conditions.description: Test if the object can move a given distance in specified direction, checking for obstacles along the way.

params.name: X
params.description: The new horizontal speed of the object to set, in pixels per second.

params.name: Y
params.description: The new vertical speed of the object to set, in pixels per second.

actions.name: Set ignoring input
actions.description: Set whether to ignore the controls for this movement.

params.name: Input
params.description: Set whether to ignore the controls for this movement.

params.name: Control
params.description: The movement control to simulate pressing.

actions.name: Set enabled
actions.description: Set whether this behavior is enabled.

params.name: State
params.description: Set whether to enable or disable the behavior.

actions.name: Set grid position
actions.display_text: Set {my} grid position to {2} to the cell at [i]({0},{1})[/i]

params.name: X
params.description: The column to move the object to.

params.name: Y
params.description: The row to move the object to.

params.name: Movement
params.description: Choose whether to move the object instantly to the location, or to animate over normally.

actions.name: Set grid dimensions
actions.description: Set the object's grid size and offset
actions.display_text: Set {my} grid size to [b]({0},{1})[/b] and offset to [i]({2},{3})[/i]

params.name: Width
params.description: The new width to set for columns.

params.name: Height
params.description: The new height to set for rows.

params.name: X offset
params.description: The new X offset to set for the objects grid.

params.name: Y offset
params.description: The new Y offset to set for the objects grid.

params.name: Default controls
params.description: Whether to enable or disable the behavior default controls.

expressions.name: GridX
expressions.description: The grid column the object is currently in.

expressions.name: GridY
expressions.description: The grid row the object is currently in.

expressions.name: SpeedX
expressions.description: The current object horizontal speed, in pixels per second.

expressions.name: SpeedY
expressions.description: The current object vertical speed, in pixels per second.

expressions.name: TargetX
expressions.description: The layout co-ordinates of the grid column the object is currently heading towards.

expressions.name: TargetY
expressions.description: The layout co-ordinates of the grid row the object is currently heading towards.

expressions.name: GridTargetX
expressions.description: The grid column the object is currently heading towards.

expressions.name: GridTargetY
expressions.description: The grid row the object is currently heading towards.
